title: 物品只能设置玻璃类型,怎么调整颜色呢
author: 43729417@qq.com
txt_content:
ItemStack is = new ItemStack(STAINED_GLASS_PANE);
这个是设置玻璃类型,但是怎么设置颜色呢, 试过好多种方法都不行

replies.author: Puffs.
replies.txt_content:
例如：
ItemStack item = new ItemStack(160,1,(short)15);

replies.author: 43729417@qq.com
replies.txt_content:
1349905649 发表于 2017-4-13 15:45
例如：
ItemStack item = new ItemStack(160,1,(short)15);
3Q,,,搞定了
